messages.subject: Re: Shirley Temple song
messages.msgSnippet: ... I didn t know, but according to the wonderful  Internet Movie Database (http://www.imdb.com) it was Bright Eyes. Is there a connection between that and
messages.messageBody:
> Does anyone know what movie Shirley Temple sings "On The Good Ship
>Lollipop"?

I didn't know, but according to the wonderful Internet Movie Database
(http://www.imdb.com) it was "Bright Eyes."

Is there a connection between that and Hazel's screen name then?

Mattie

messages.subject: Re: Shirley Temple song
messages.msgSnippet: ... Ahh--some diversion! From my misspent Saturday afternoons I remember she s in a plane and dancing down the aisle...Little Miss Marker? But the plane part I
messages.messageBody:
>From: "A. Yates" <hooperck@...>
>
>Does anyone know what movie Shirley Temple sings "On The Good Ship
>Lollipop"?
>Thanks,
>Ann


Ahh--some diversion!

From my misspent Saturday afternoons I remember she's in a plane and dancing
down the aisle...Little Miss Marker?

But the plane part I really remember.
Can't wait to find out the real answer--
Carolyn
